Reviews.Title: THESE ARE GREAT TOO FOR SECURITY INSIDE YOUR WORKSHOP
Reviews.Author: CHARLES
Reviews.Content: WE PUT THESE INSIDE OUR WORKSHOP AND WHEN THE LIGHTS ARE OUT AT NIGHT AND NO MATTER WHAT MOVES INSIDE THERE ; IT CAN BE SEEN WITH CLARITY. I FEEL VERY SAFE WITH THIS SET OF CAMERAS AND PLAN ON GETTING MORE OF THEM . THE QUALITY IS GREAT AND THIS IS MY SECOND SET TO ADD TO THE ONES I PURCHASED 10 YEARS AGO. GET YOU A SET OF THESE AND TRUST ME YOU WILL FEEL SAFER. EVEN YOU DEER HUNTERS AND SITE SEEING PEOPLE WILL BE ABLE TO SEE WHAT LURKS IN THE NITE.

Reviews.Title: Cam
Reviews.Author: Ang
Reviews.Content: Pictures not clear. Night time horrible. Did not like this camera at all. We were disappointed in this purchase. Never again

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: RNJMelissari
Reviews.Content: great package,price and look until you plug them in and try getting past the constant static and noise. My husband was so upset.We will be in process of returning this product a.s.a.p

Reviews.Title: very very poor quality
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: very poor quality, they work for a couple months , i dont recomend it, dont waste your money, get somenting better

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I got everything I wanted from this product.the wires are on the short side to the cameras and would be a lot better if they came about 6 feet longer.Clear picyure on the monitor and pretty good reception

Reviews.Title: DIY Security Monitoring
Reviews.Author: Djuan L. Toliver "DT"
Reviews.Content: No more missing packages or unexplained backyard vandalism from pets or noctural varmits. Lights around the camera lens show up at night to let people know that they are on and working.

Reviews.Title: These work for what I need
Reviews.Author: Kim Ruble
Reviews.Content: I found these useful. As long as there isn't to much obstructing the signal it's pretty clear. Trees and to many walls distort it. But other than that they work great!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: hesty24
Reviews.Content: If you read the only 5 star rating on the camera, it is by a person named "Charles".  Look at his other reviews.  What's that, oh, only one other review under his profile, and it happens to be on the same date as this product review?  Hmmm, smells fishy to me, looks like a rating bloater.  I am more inclined to believe the one star reviewers for the simple fact that this camera system operates on the same frequency as many wireless appliances (namely cordless phones).  Feels like there would be a lot of cross interference in signals, and possibly degradation the audio and video quality of the cam system.  Save your money, look for a more reputable system.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable wireless surveillance solution
380 TV line video resolution. Wireless frequency: 2.4 GHz
Easily installation, plug and play just connect receiver to your TV or VCR
Up to 100 ft wireless transmission and up to 26 ft night vision
Package contents: 2 x IR CMOS Cameras with built in transmitter, 1 x Wireless Receiver, 3 x Power Supplies (2 for Camera, 1 for Receiver), 1 RCA Jack Video/Audio Cable
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 CH Wireless Audio Video Outdoor Day Night Security Camera Home CCTV System WA1
